translation.en: SAYURI: A story like mine should never be told.
translation.zh: 我的故事永远不该被人知晓

translation.en: For my world is as forbidden as it is fragile.
translation.zh:
因为我的世界既充满禁忌
又十分脆弱

translation.en: Without its mysteries, it cannot survive.
translation.zh: 一旦失去神秘感 它就会毁灭

translation.en: I certainly wasn't born to the life of a geisha.
translation.zh: 我显然并非生来就是艺妓

translation.en: Like so much in my strange life... ...I was carried there by the current.
translation.zh:
像我古怪的人生中其他很多经历一样
我是被洪流裹挟进入这个世界的

translation.en: The first time I knew my mother was sick...
translation.zh: 我第一次知道我母亲病了

translation.en: ...was when my father threw the fish back into the sea.
translation.zh: 是我父亲把鱼扔回海里的时候

translation.en: That night we went hungry. "To understand emptiness," he told us.
translation.zh:
那天晚上我们都饿着肚子
他说是要让我们明白空虚的感觉

translation.en: Mother always said my sister Satsu was like wood.
translation.zh: 母亲总是说我姐姐左津是木属性的

translation.en: As rooted to the earth as a sakura tree.
translation.zh: 像樱花树一样扎根大地

translation.en: But she told me I was like water.
translation.zh: 她说我是水属性

translation.en: Water can carve its way, even through stone.
translation.zh:
水可以冲出自己的路
甚至能穿破石头

translation.en: And when trapped, water makes a new path.
translation.zh: 一旦水被困住 又会冲出新的道路

translation.en: BEKKU: Stop here.
translation.zh: 停在这里

translation.en: These are the girls from Tanaka? Sisters, yes, from Yoroido.
translation.zh:
-是田中弄来的姑娘吗？
-没错 是一对姐妹 来自铠户

translation.en: This one, maybe. The other one, no.
translation.zh: 这个或许可以 另一个不行

translation.en: Show your respect for Mother. You must not speak. I will answer for you.
translation.zh:
对姆妈放尊重点
你不准说话 我会代你回答

translation.en: AUNTIE: Kneel. And head down. Never look her in the face.
translation.zh: 跪下 头也低下 永远不准直视她

translation.en: -How old are you? -She is Year of the Rooster.
translation.zh:
-你多大了？
-她是鸡年出生的

translation.en: Only 9.
translation.zh: 才九岁

translation.en: Where is my sister?
translation.zh: 我姐姐去哪儿了？

translation.en: Let me see those eyes.
translation.zh: 让我看看你的眼睛

translation.en: Look at me.
translation.zh: 看着我

translation.en: Too much water.
translation.zh: 水太多了

translation.en: But, Okasan, a little water is good to guard against fire.
translation.zh: 但是 姆妈 水能克火

translation.en: You won't have to worry about the okiya burning...
translation.zh: 这样你就不用担心置屋失火

translation.en: ...losing all your kimono.
translation.zh: 烧掉你所有的和服

translation.en: These country girls. Too late to send her back now.
translation.zh:
这些乡下女孩
太迟了 没办法再送回去了

translation.en: Go.
translation.zh: 走

translation.en: Pumpkin. Keep her quiet. Mother is downstairs.
translation.zh: 小南瓜 别让她出声 姆妈在下面

translation.en: CHIYO: Let me go!
translation.zh: 放我出去

translation.en: Let me go! Let me go! Let me go! -Stop that. -Let me go!
translation.zh: 放我出去

translation.en: Mother will hear you. She's got a bamboo stick.
translation.zh:
-放我出去
-姆妈会听到的 -她有一根竹鞭
-我要找我姐姐

translation.en: I want my sister! Satsu!
translation.zh:
-她有一根竹鞭
-我要找我姐姐 左津

translation.en: I cried too at first.
translation.zh: 我那时候一开始也哭过

translation.en: You know, it is easier if you just forget everything... ...that happened before you came to the okiya.
translation.zh:
如果你能忘掉来置屋之前的一切
会好过一些

translation.en: If you impress Mother and do exactly as she says...
translation.zh: 如果你能讨姆妈的喜欢 听她的话

translation.en: ...she will send you to school to be a geisha.
translation.zh: 她会送你去学习如何成为一名艺妓

translation.en: A what? A geisha. Like Hatsumomo.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-艺妓 像初桃那样

translation.en: You will get to drink sake and sleep until noon.
translation.zh:
那样你就有清酒喝
还能一直睡到中午

translation.en: Where is my sister?
translation.zh: 我姐姐去哪儿了？

translation.en: Probably in another okiya in the hanamachi.
translation.zh: 可能在花街的另一家置屋里

translation.en: Your family sold you to this house.
translation.zh: 你的家人把你卖到了这里

translation.en: You live here now.
translation.zh: 你现在要在这里生活了

translation.en: Outside, you wear these. Inside, these.
translation.zh: 在室外就穿这双鞋 在室内穿这双

translation.en: We don't display our naked feet like monkeys.
translation.zh: 我们不会像猴子一样赤着脚

translation.en: It's not flesh we're selling here. This is a geisha house.
translation.zh: 我们这里不是卖肉的 是艺妓屋

translation.en: Remember to always honor this okiya. You listen, you learn.
translation.zh:
记住 要永远敬重这座置屋
仔细听 认真学

translation.en: Now get to work.
translation.zh: 好了 开始干活吧

translation.en: Be quiet. Hatsumomo is sleeping.
translation.zh: 小点声 初桃在睡觉

translation.en: Pumpkin, when can I go outside?
translation.zh: 小南瓜 我什么时候能出去？

translation.en: Outside the okiya? You can't. It's not allowed.
translation.zh:
离开置屋？你离开不了
那是不允许的

translation.en: How will I find Satsu?
translation.zh: 那我要怎么找到左津？

translation.en: You can't just walk up to every house in the hanamachi.
translation.zh: 你总不能到花街挨家挨户去找

translation.en: Do you know how many there are?
translation.zh: 你知道总共有多少户吗？

translation.en: Look.
translation.zh: 你看

translation.en: HATSUMOMO: Tighter!
translation.zh: 再系紧点

translation.en: PUMPKIN: Chiyo. Chiyo-chan.
translation.zh: 千代 小千代

translation.en: Come. Two nights ago, Hatsumomo had to stay at the teahouse until dawn.
translation.zh:
过来 两晚前 初桃不得不在一家茶屋
待到天亮才回来

translation.en: That's what she told Mother. But she was really here with a man the whole--
translation.zh:
她跟姆妈是这么说的
但实际上她是在这里跟男人私会

translation.en: Why can't you be quiet?
translation.zh:
-整个…
-你不能安静点吗？

translation.en: So this is the new arrival.
translation.zh: 这就是那个新来的吧

translation.en: A pity she still stinks of fish.
translation.zh: 真遗憾 她身上还是一股鱼臭味

translation.en: Stay out of my room. Your fingers smell.
translation.zh: 别进我的房间 你的手指很臭

translation.en: I can't have you touching my things.
translation.zh: 我绝不允许你碰我的东西

translation.en: AUNTIE: Only reason Mother tolerates Hatsumomo... ...is because she brings in good money.
translation.zh:
姆妈肯忍受初桃的唯一原因
就是她能为这里赚到很多钱

translation.en: Never forget.
translation.zh: 永远别忘了

translation.en: It is Hatsumomo who pays for your supper... ...the clothes on your back.
translation.zh:
你有饭吃、有衣服穿
都是靠初桃赚来的钱

translation.en: By the time she was 20...
translation.zh: 她20岁的时候

translation.en: ...she had already earned back her purchase price.
translation.zh: 就已经把赎身钱赚够了

translation.en: Unheard of.
translation.zh: 简直闻所未闻

translation.en: She has been the talk of the hanamachi ever since.
translation.zh: 从那之后她就成了花街的头牌人物

translation.en: These are all hers?
translation.zh: 这些都是她的吗？

translation.en: Certainly not. They belong to the okiya.
translation.zh: 当然不是 是置屋的

translation.en: A kimono like this, made of Tatsumura silk...
translation.zh: 像这种用龙村丝绸织成的和服

translation.en: ...it would take a lifetime to earn.
translation.zh: 要赚一辈子的钱才能买得起

translation.en: A geisha needs an elegant wardrobe... ...just like an artist needs ink.
translation.zh:
艺妓需要华美的衣服
就像画家需要墨一样

translation.en: If she's not properly dressed, then she is not a true geisha.
translation.zh:
如果她穿得不够华美得体
那她就不是真正的艺妓

translation.en: Nobody told me what a geisha is. You will find out soon enough.
translation.zh:
-还没人告诉我艺妓是什么
-你很快就会知道的

translation.en: I have news for you, child.
translation.zh: 有个消息要告诉你 孩子

translation.en: Mother has determined it is off to school with you.
translation.zh: 姆妈已经决定送你去学习

translation.en: You are to become geisha.
translation.zh: 你将成为一名艺妓

translation.en: MOTHER: Chiyo! Pumpkin!
translation.zh: 千代、小南瓜

translation.en: Quick, quick! Don't be late!
translation.zh: 快点 别迟到

translation.en: You will be late. Go. Go.
translation.zh: 快点 你们会迟到的 快走

translation.en: PUMPKIN: This way!
translation.zh: 这边

translation.en: CHIYO: Pumpkin! Pumpkin!
translation.zh: 小南瓜…

translation.en: Pumpkin! I'm going to run. I'm going to find Satsu.
translation.zh: 小南瓜 我要逃跑 我要去找左津

translation.en: No, Chiyo-chan, don't!
translation.zh: 不 小千代 不要

translation.en: You will ruin your own chances. And mine too.
translation.zh:
你会毁掉你的大好机会
也会毁掉我的

translation.en: Please, stay with me.
translation.zh: 求你了 跟我一起

translation.en: Squid. Come on!
translation.zh: 是鱿鱼 跟我来

translation.en: PUMPKIN: Look for your sister's name later.
translation.zh: 待会儿再找你姐姐的名字

translation.en: [IN ENGLISH] You are late!
translation.zh: 你们迟到了

translation.en: MOTHER: Chiyo! Where is Granny's food?
translation.zh: 千代 婆婆的饭在哪儿？

translation.en: GRANNY: Where have you been?
translation.zh: 你们去哪儿了？

translation.en: -It's freezing cold! -Hai.
translation.zh:
-真冷啊
-是啊

translation.en: Close the window!
translation.zh:
-快把窗户关上
-好的

translation.en: ANNOUNCER [OVER RADIO]: --with millions of people unemployed...
translation.zh:
-快点…
-好的 数百万人失业 处于饥饿的边缘

translation.en: ...on the brink of starvation.
translation.zh: 数百万人失业 处于饥饿的边缘

translation.en: Another cause of Germany's suffering is the constant struggle... ...to pay the heavy burden of war reparations it's still....
translation.zh:
…持续挣扎
而战争赔款的沉重负担…

translation.en: MOTHER: Chiyo! Chiyo, come quickly!
translation.zh: 千代 快过来

translation.en: Hatsumomo is at the bathhouse. Tidy up.
translation.zh: 初桃去澡堂了 快收拾她的屋子

translation.en: -But she told me to stay out-- -Hatsumomo does not run this okiya.
translation.zh:
-但她叫我别进…
-初桃可不是这个置屋的老板

translation.en: ANNOUNCER [OVER RADIO]: The Japanese emperor has agreed... ...to send army instructors to Manchuria.
translation.zh:
日本天皇已经同意派军事顾问
前往满洲…

translation.en: HATSUMOMO: Why, look who's in my room.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧谁进了我的房间

translation.en: Did you touch this?
translation.zh: 你碰过这个吗？

translation.en: I can just hear the General now.
translation.zh: 我仿佛都能听到将军的说话声了

translation.en: "Why, Hatsumomo, you used to smell of jasmine.
translation.zh: “初桃 你以前浑身都是茉莉香

translation.en: What's this new perfume? Blowfish?"
translation.zh:
现在换了什么新香水？
河豚鱼味的吗？”

translation.en: I told you never to touch my things. Can't you understand why?
translation.zh:
我叫你永远别碰我的东西
你不明白为什么吗？

translation.en: Because your General will say, "Hatsumomo, you stink."
translation.zh:
因为你的将军会说：
“初桃 你身上好臭”

translation.en: At least you don't smell as bad as your sister.
translation.zh: 至少你不像你姐姐那么臭

translation.en: You know, she was here. She came by looking for you.
translation.zh:
其实她也来过这里 -她来找过你
-什么？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh:
-她来找过你
-什么？

translation.en: Was I wrong to ask her to leave? Please, tell me where she is.
translation.zh:
-我叫她离开难道做错了吗？
-求你告诉我 她在哪儿

translation.en: Only if you swear yourself to me first.
translation.zh: 除非你先发誓忠于我

translation.en: Yes? Huh?
translation.zh: 怎么样？

translation.en: Now, get out.
translation.zh: 滚出去

translation.en: Shh! Hatsumomo. You'll wake the entire house.
translation.zh: 初桃 你会把大家都吵醒的

translation.en: Your big sister is thirsty. So am I. Go get us some beer.
translation.zh:
你大姐渴了 我也是
去帮我们拿些啤酒来

translation.en: I'm not in the mood for beer.
translation.zh: 我没心情喝啤酒

translation.en: I know what you're in the mood for, and his name is Koichi.
translation.zh: 我知道你有心情干什么 他的名字叫幸一

translation.en: What did you say, Korin? Huh?
translation.zh: 你刚说什么？香林

translation.en: I'm sorry. I forgot.
translation.zh: 对不起 我一时忘了

translation.en: You're just jealous someone cares for me.
translation.zh: 你不过是嫉妒有人喜欢我

translation.en: Guess who this belongs to.
translation.zh: 猜猜这是谁的

translation.en: A geisha as desired as she is... ...ought to keep a close eye on her clothes.
translation.zh:
像她那样的红牌艺妓
就该看好自己的衣服

translation.en: -It's Mameha's? HATSUMOMO: Yes.
translation.zh:
-是豆叶的吗？
-是的

translation.en: KORIN: How did you get it? HATSUMOMO: Bribed her maid.
translation.zh:
-你是怎么弄到的？
-我贿赂了她的女仆

translation.en: -There. -I can't.
translation.zh: 我下不了手

translation.en: Give it to her.
translation.zh: 让她来

translation.en: -Little Chiyo, come. Come. -Chiyo.
translation.zh:
-千代 过来
-千代

translation.en: HATSUMOMO: Now, then, little Chiyo, it's time to practice your calligraphy.
translation.zh: 小千代 练书法的时候到了

translation.en: There.
translation.zh: 在这里画

translation.en: Remember, you swore yourself to me. Yes.
translation.zh: 记住 你发誓要忠于我了 对吧？

translation.en: Don't let anybody see you.
translation.zh: 别让任何人看到你

translation.en: Go, go!
translation.zh: 快走

translation.en: This will teach the great Mameha.
translation.zh: 这会给豆叶一个教训

translation.en: Thieving rat!
translation.zh: 小贼

translation.en: That kimono was worth more than you!
translation.zh:
-那件和服可比你值钱多了
-当心点

translation.en: Careful! You will hurt yourself more than her!
translation.zh:
-那件和服可比你值钱多了
-当心点 别没把她打伤 反倒把你自己伤着了

translation.en: Let me.
translation.zh: 我来吧

translation.en: AUNTIE: Kneel!
translation.zh: 跪下

translation.en: What have you done to Hatsumomo?
translation.zh: 你对初桃做了什么？

translation.en: I haven't done anything. I promise you.
translation.zh: 我什么都没干 我保证

translation.en: Her little trick with that kimono will cost you.
translation.zh:
她利用那件和服耍的诡计
会要了你的命

translation.en: Whatever you have done to anger her, you'd be wise to stop now.
translation.zh:
不管你做了什么惹怒了她
现在都必须停止了

translation.en: Lie facedown!
translation.zh: 脸朝下趴着

translation.en: I will beat you hard... ...so Mother does not beat you harder.
translation.zh:
我会狠狠地打你
这样才能逃过姆妈更狠的毒打

translation.en: I told you not to let anybody see you.
translation.zh: 我叫你别让任何人看到了

translation.en: I have kept my promise. So tell me, where is she?
translation.zh: 我遵守了诺言 告诉我 她在哪儿？

translation.en: She's in the next hanamachi in the house called Tatsuyo.
translation.zh:
她在下一条花街
一个叫辰代的房子里

translation.en: In the pleasure district.
translation.zh: 那里是风月区

translation.en: Trust me, little Chiyo, you will find her.
translation.zh: 相信我 小千代 你会找到她的

translation.en: Tatsuyo?
translation.zh: 辰代？

translation.en: CHIYO: Satsu! Satsu! Satsu!
translation.zh: 左津…

translation.en: Satsu from Yoroido! Satsu! Satsu!
translation.zh: 铠户来的左津 左津…

translation.en: No! Satsu! No! Satsu! Satsu!
translation.zh: 不要 左津

translation.en: Sat--
translation.zh: 左…

translation.en: Satsu! Satsu!
translation.zh: 左津…

translation.en: Chiyo-chan!
translation.zh: 小千代

translation.en: What took you so long? -But, Satsu, I tried! -Shh!
translation.zh:
-你怎么这么久才来？
-左津 我努力过了

translation.en: I went to your okiya weeks ago. They laughed and turned me away.
translation.zh:
我几周前去了你们的置屋
他们嘲笑我 还把我赶走了

translation.en: Please, I did not know! I've missed you so much!
translation.zh:
-我真不知道
-我好想你

translation.en: Let's leave. Tonight.
translation.zh:
-我们今晚就走
-但我们需要钱 千代

translation.en: But we need money, Chiyo. I know I can steal some first thing tomorrow.
translation.zh:
-我们今晚就走
-但我们需要钱 千代 我知道我明天一早就能偷到些钱

translation.en: -No, please! Tonight! -No, tomorrow!
translation.zh:
-不 我们今晚就走
-不行 明天吧

translation.en: Meet me at the Sasame Bridge as soon as it's dark.
translation.zh: 天黑的时候在笹目桥跟我会合

translation.en: Now I have to go. Quickly, before someone catches us.
translation.zh:
我得走了 你也快走
别被别人抓到我们见面了

translation.en: What if I cannot get away?
translation.zh: 如果我无法脱身怎么办？

translation.en: Be there, Chiyo. It's our one chance.
translation.zh:
一定要去 千代
那是我们唯一的机会

translation.en: Once I've left, I can't go back.
translation.zh: 一旦我离开 就回不了头了

translation.en: I've waited as long as I can. Now go!
translation.zh: 我已经等得够久了 快走

translation.en: What is she doing here? She's seen us.
translation.zh: 她在这里干什么？她看到我们了

translation.en: Stupid girl. Why have you come back?
translation.zh: 蠢蛋 你跑回来干什么？

translation.en: Your perfect chance to escape!
translation.zh: 这是你逃跑的大好机会

translation.en: Get in!
translation.zh: 快进来

translation.en: -Koichi, please. -Look at us.
translation.zh: 幸一 求你了

translation.en: Sneaking around like criminals.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧我们 像罪犯一样偷偷摸摸的

translation.en: -Koichi, don't-- -It's degrading.
translation.zh:
-幸一 别走…
-这太丢脸了

translation.en: MOTHER: What's going on?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: Koichi.
translation.zh: 幸一

translation.en: MOTHER: Who's there?
translation.zh: 谁在那里？

translation.en: Go! Now! Go!
translation.zh: 走 快走

translation.en: MOTHER: Show your face.
translation.zh: 给我站出来

translation.en: Look, Okasan! I caught her stealing!
translation.zh: 你看 姆妈 我抓到她偷东西了

translation.en: She was running away with her sister, the whore!
translation.zh:
她本来打算
跟她那个妓女姐姐一起逃跑

translation.en: You little thief!
translation.zh: 你个小贼

translation.en: CHIYO: No! She is lying!
translation.zh:
-不 她在说谎
-我们为她付出了那么多

translation.en: -After all we have done for her! -I saw her with a man! Right there!
translation.zh:
-不 她在说谎
-我们为她付出了那么多 我看到她跟一个男人在一起 就在那
他的名字叫幸一

translation.en: His name is Koichi!
translation.zh:
我看到她跟一个男人在一起 就在那
他的名字叫幸一

translation.en: Shut up! We should kick her out!
translation.zh: 闭嘴 我们该把她赶出去

translation.en: Take her arms.
translation.zh: 抓住她的手臂

translation.en: You are never to see him again. Huh?
translation.zh: 你永远不能再跟他见面了

translation.en: What do you think? A geisha is free to love? Never.
translation.zh:
你是怎么想的？
一个艺妓也可以自由恋爱？不可能的

translation.en: Bolt the gate! No one is leaving this okiya.
translation.zh: 把门栓上 没人可以离开这个置屋

translation.en: MOTHER: Dr. Moro is very expensive.
translation.zh: 茂吕医生收费很贵的

translation.en: You seem to be racking up quite a debt.
translation.zh: 你似乎已经欠了一身债了

translation.en: Kimono destroyed... ...geisha school...
translation.zh: 毁掉一件和服的钱 上艺妓学校的钱

translation.en: ...rice and pickles, train ticket, Mr. Bekku.
translation.zh: 饭菜钱、车票钱、付给别宫先生的钱

translation.en: All this on top of the money I paid Mr. Tanaka.
translation.zh: 另外再加上我付给田中先生买你的钱

translation.en: And for what?
translation.zh: 这都是为了什么？

translation.en: And now I hear that your sister has run away.
translation.zh: 我听说你姐姐已经逃跑了

translation.en: She didn't wait for you. And now she can never come back.
translation.zh:
她没有等你
现在她永远别想再回来了

translation.en: You must forget you ever had a sister. Huh?
translation.zh: 你必须忘记你有姐姐这回事

translation.en: We are your only family now.
translation.zh: 现在我们是你唯一的家人了

translation.en: "Dear Satsu and little Chiyo: As one who was once an orphan child myself...
translation.zh:
“亲爱的左津和千代
我曾经也是个孤儿

translation.en: ...this humble person is sorry to inform you...
translation.zh: 鄙人很遗憾地通知你们

translation.en: ...that six weeks after you left for your new life in Miyako...
translation.zh: 在你们去京都开始新生活的六周后

translation.en: ...the suffering of your honored mother came to its end.
translation.zh:
你们的母亲
苦难的人生终于走到了尽头

translation.en: And only a few weeks afterward...
translation.zh: 短短数周之后

translation.en: ...your honored father departed this world as well.
translation.zh: 你们的父亲也告别了这个世界

translation.en: This humble person feels confident both your honored parents...
translation.zh: 鄙人相信你们的父亲母亲

translation.en: ...have found their places in paradise. But happily...."
translation.zh: 都已经进入了天堂 幸福地…”

translation.en: SAYURI: At the temple... ...there is a poem called "Loss" carved into the stone.
translation.zh:
在庙里 有一首叫《失去》的诗
被刻在了石头上

translation.en: It has three words. But the poet has scratched them out.
translation.zh:
它通篇只有三个字
但诗人却把它们都刮掉了

translation.en: You cannot read "Loss." Only feel it.
translation.zh: 失去不是文字能表达的 只能感受它

translation.en: My father and mother had left this life.
translation.zh: 我的父亲、母亲离开了这个世界

translation.en: My sister, I never heard of again.
translation.zh: 我的姐姐也从此杳无音信

translation.en: I had dishonored the okiya, so Mother had other plans for me.
translation.zh:
我让置屋蒙羞了
于是姆妈对我另有安排

translation.en: I would pay back my debt... ...year after year after year.
translation.zh: 我将年复一年地还债

translation.en: Not as a geisha. As her slave.
translation.zh: 不是作为艺妓 而是作为她的奴隶

translation.en: CHAIRMAN: It is too pretty a day to be so unhappy.
translation.zh:
天气这么好
若是不开心 可真是辜负了

translation.en: Did you fall down?
translation.zh: 你摔倒了吗？

translation.en: Why so shy?
translation.zh: 为什么这么害羞？

translation.en: Nothing to be ashamed of. We all stumble from time to time.
translation.zh:
没什么好丢脸的
每个人都有摔倒的时候

translation.en: You see that enchanting lady in green?
translation.zh:
你看到那位穿绿色衣服的
美丽女士了吗？

translation.en: Once, when she was just a maiko, she fell clean off her wooden shoes.
translation.zh:
她刚当上舞伎的时候
有一次穿着木屐摔倒了

translation.en: It's true, I did.
translation.zh: 是真的 我的确摔倒了

translation.en: And now look at her. So elegant.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧她现在的样子 多么优雅

translation.en: Mr. Chairman, shouldn't we hurry? We will miss the beginning.
translation.zh:
会长先生 我们得快点走了
否则要错过开始部分了

translation.en: We see the Spring Dances every year. We can spare a moment.
translation.zh:
我们每年都会看春舞表演
晚点再去也无妨

translation.en: What's your name?
translation.zh: 你叫什么名字？

translation.en: Don't be afraid to look at me.
translation.zh: 别不敢看我

translation.en: Do you like sweet plum or cherry?
translation.zh: 你是喜欢李子 还是樱桃？

translation.en: You mean, to eat?
translation.zh: 你是说吃的吗？

translation.en: I like sweet plum myself. Come.
translation.zh: 我喜欢吃李子 跟我来

translation.en: None of us find as much kindness in this life as we should.
translation.zh: 世上的善意实在太少了

translation.en: Hi. Both kinds, please.
translation.zh: 两种都要

translation.en: My children wait for these every spring.
translation.zh: 我的孩子们每年春季都盼着吃这个

translation.en: Now I'm a geisha too.
translation.zh: 现在我也是个艺妓了

translation.en: And so you are.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: How did you come by such surprising eyes?
translation.zh: 你怎么会有这么与众不同的眼睛？

translation.en: My mother gave them to me.
translation.zh: 我的母亲赐予我的

translation.en: Generous of her, wasn't it?
translation.zh: 她很慷慨 对吧？

translation.en: As you have been to me.
translation.zh: 你对我也很慷慨

translation.en: Smile for me, won't you?
translation.zh: 笑一个给我看看 好不好？

translation.en: There, now. That is your gift to me.
translation.zh: 这才对嘛 这是你赠我的礼物

translation.en: This will buy your supper. Now, promise me one thing:
translation.zh: 这足够你买晚餐吃了 答应我一件事

translation.en: Next time you take a tumble, no frowns.
translation.zh: 下次再摔倒 可别皱着眉头了

translation.en: That's better.
translation.zh: 好多了

translation.en: SAYURI: In that moment... ...I changed from a girl facing nothing but emptiness...
translation.zh: 在那一刻 我从一个心如死灰的女孩

translation.en: ...to someone with purpose.
translation.zh: 变成了一个有人生目标的人

translation.en: I saw that to be a geisha...
translation.zh: 我忽然明白 成为艺妓

translation.en: ...could be a stepping stone to something else:
translation.zh: 也许是实现更伟大目标的垫脚石

translation.en: A place in his world.
translation.zh: 能够让我进入他的世界

translation.en: The money the Chairman had given me...
translation.zh: 会长给我的钱

translation.en: ...could have bought fish and rice for a month.
translation.zh: 如果买鱼和米 可以让我吃一个月

translation.en: But I gave it back in prayer... ...keeping only his handkerchief.
translation.zh:
但我都放进了功德箱里
只留下了他的手帕

translation.en: I asked one day to become a geisha.
translation.zh: 我祈求能成为艺妓

translation.en: And then, somehow, to meet him again.
translation.zh: 将来有一天能再遇见他

translation.en: ANNOUNCER [OVER RADIO]: The Imperial War Ministry announces news:
translation.zh: 大日本军部宣布

translation.en: A great victory for our friend Adolf Hitler.
translation.zh:
我们的盟友阿道夫希特勒
取得了重大胜利

translation.en: Today, Hitler demanded self-determination... ...for Germans living in Austria.
translation.zh:
今天 希特勒要求
居住在奥地利的德国人拥有自决权

translation.en: Hitler's quest for lebensraum, "living space"....
translation.zh: 希特勒对生存空间的追求…

translation.en: PUMPKIN: Chiyo-chan, I can't find my comb! Did you find it yet?
translation.zh:
小千代 我找不到我的梳子
你看到了吗？

translation.en: AUNTIE: Pumpkin, it's time to go.
translation.zh:
-小南瓜 该走了
-我找到了

translation.en: CHIYO: I found it. PUMPKIN: Arigato, Chiyo.
translation.zh:
-小南瓜 该走了
-我找到了 谢谢你 千代

translation.en: Oh, I couldn't sleep last night, I was so worried about my stupid hair.
translation.zh:
我昨晚一晚上都没睡
我好担心我乱七八糟的头发

translation.en: Am I lopsided? You look beautiful.
translation.zh:
-我的头发是歪的吗？
-你很美

translation.en: With your hair like that... ...you look more like a pumpkin than ever.
translation.zh:
这样的发型
让你比任何时候都更像小南瓜

translation.en: Don't poke your neck forward like a tortoise.
translation.zh: 别像乌龟一样把脖子往前伸

translation.en: She's not ready? We will be late.
translation.zh: 她还没准备好吗？我们要迟到了

translation.en: Poor Pumpkin. Her debut, and everyone will be staring at you.
translation.zh:
可怜的小南瓜 她首次登台
但大家都会盯着你看

translation.en: -Hurry up, huh? -This time...
translation.zh: 快点 这一次 演奏前先把三味线调一下音

translation.en: ...tune your shamisen before you play.
translation.zh: 这一次 演奏前先把三味线调一下音

translation.en: When you make a fool of yourself, your big sister gets the blame.
translation.zh: 如果你出丑 你大姐就会被怪罪

translation.en: Stop crying, your face will run.
translation.zh: 别哭了 把妆都哭花了

translation.en: HATSUMOMO: Pumpkin! PUMPKIN: Hai.
translation.zh:
-小南瓜
-来了

translation.en: CHIYO: Pumpkin!
translation.zh: 小南瓜

translation.en: SAYURI: The winter I turned 15, I saw the Chairman again.
translation.zh:
我15岁的那年冬天
再次见到了那位会长

translation.en: But that wasn't the only surprise fate brought me that season.
translation.zh:
但那并不是
命运在那个季节带给我的唯一惊喜

translation.en: Along with the snow came a most unexpected visitor.
translation.zh:
随着那场雪的降临
一位最意想不到的访客来了

translation.en: Why is she here?
translation.zh: 她来这里干什么？

translation.en: Chiyo! Chiyo! Open the gate!
translation.zh: 千代 快开门

translation.en: MAMEHA: Now that your beloved Granny is gone... ...you'll have no need for a maid.
translation.zh:
现在你亲爱的婆婆死了
你也不需要女仆了

translation.en: MOTHER: I would never question the great Mameha...
translation.zh: 我永远不会质疑豆叶小姐的决定 不过你明明可以选择花街的任何人

translation.en: ...but you could choose anyone in the hanamachi.
translation.zh: 不过你明明可以选择花街的任何人

translation.en: You flatter me, truly.
translation.zh: 你真是过奖了

translation.en: I'd give you my Pumpkin if she were not already tied to Hatsumomo.
translation.zh:
我倒是愿意把小南瓜给你
可惜她已经跟了初桃

translation.en: Please. I would never dream of asking.
translation.zh: 我不会不自量力地开口要她的

translation.en: Besides, I could always sell Chiyo to Mrs. Tatsuyo.
translation.zh:
再说了 我总是可以把千代
卖给辰代夫人的

translation.en: MAMEHA: With your eye for beauty and nose for talent...
translation.zh:
以你这双善于发现美的眼睛
和发现才华的直觉

translation.en: ...surely you can see what a terrible waste that would be.
translation.zh: 你显然明白那样就太浪费了

translation.en: If you were not the kindhearted geisha I know you to be...
translation.zh: 如果我不知道你是个好心肠的艺妓

translation.en: ...then I might think you were scheming against Hatsumomo.
translation.zh:
那我肯定以为你在搞阴谋诡计
对付初桃

translation.en: Then I'm grateful, Mrs. Nitta, that you don't have a suspicious mind.
translation.zh:
那我真的非常感激
你不是个多疑的人 新田太太

translation.en: Perhaps you can pique my interest with...
translation.zh: 其实我也可以考虑下答应你 不过…

translation.en: MAMEHA: Yes?
translation.zh: 不过什么？

translation.en: ...your offer.
translation.zh: 你开的条件得让我心动

translation.en: I will cover Chiyo's schooling, all her expenses... ...till after her debut.
translation.zh:
我会负责支付千代学习的费用
以及一切开支 直到她首次登台

translation.en: Now I am confident you are teasing.
translation.zh: 我现在确定你是在开玩笑了

translation.en: I could not be more sincere.
translation.zh: 我真的是认真的

translation.en: If Chiyo hasn't repaid her debt within six months after her debut--
translation.zh:
如果千代在首次登台后六个月内
没能把债还清…

translation.en: Impossible! Too little time. --then I will pay you twice over.
translation.zh:
-那是不可能的 时间太短了
-那我就付你双倍的费用

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 为什么…

translation.en: No geisha could ever....
translation.zh: 没有任何艺妓能…

translation.en: I am certain you will not object to one trivial condition.
translation.zh:
有个小小的条件
我想你一定不会反对

translation.en: Yes?
translation.zh: 什么条件？

translation.en: If Chiyo erases her debt in the time allowed...
translation.zh: 如果千代在规定时间内还清了债务

translation.en: ...you will have no part in her future earnings.
translation.zh: 那她以后挣的钱 你一点都无权得到

translation.en: It's too good to be true. Mameha is up to something.
translation.zh:
这事好到不像是真的
豆叶肯定有所图谋

translation.en: She isn't in it for the money. That much is for certain.
translation.zh: 她不是为了钱 这点是肯定的

translation.en: Rumor has it, ever since the prime minister bought her mizuage...
translation.zh: 传言称 自从首相买下她的初夜后

translation.en: -...she's been rich. -Mizuage?
translation.zh:
-她就变有钱了
-初夜？

translation.en: MOTHER: That so? Absurd to think she noticed Chiyo.
translation.zh:
是这样吗？ -她竟会注意到千代 真荒唐
-是因为那件和服

translation.en: It's that kimono.
translation.zh:
-她竟会注意到千代 真荒唐
-是因为那件和服

translation.en: She remembers how you destroyed it.
translation.zh: 是你毁掉的 她一直耿耿于怀

translation.en: -Now she wants to get even. MOTHER: An odd picture, isn't it?
translation.zh:
-现在她想报复你
-这一定会很奇怪

translation.en: Hatsumomo sweeping into teahouse after teahouse with our little Pumpkin.
translation.zh:
初桃带着我们的小南瓜
光临一个又一个茶屋

translation.en: And Mameha with our maid.
translation.zh: 豆叶却看上了我们的女仆

translation.en: I'm so far behind. I will never catch up to you.
translation.zh: 我落后太多了 永远都赶不上你

translation.en: Don't worry, Chiyo-chan. I will help you.
translation.zh: 别担心 小千代 我会帮你的

translation.en: Pumpkin!
translation.zh: 小南瓜

translation.en: You are never to speak to her again. Now you are rivals.
translation.zh:
你永远不能再跟她说话了
你们现在是竞争对手了

translation.en: CHIYO: Pumpkin.
translation.zh: 小南瓜

translation.en: Pumpkin.
translation.zh: 小南瓜

translation.en: SAYURI: This is how it was, this tiny world of women.
translation.zh: 女人的小世界里 现实就是这样

translation.en: Friend turned against friend.
translation.zh: 朋友之间反目成仇

translation.en: And now the two greatest geisha in Miyako at war over me.
translation.zh:
现在 京都最红的两位艺妓
因为我而掀起了大战

translation.en: Hatsumomo at my back.
translation.zh: 初桃与我为敌 豆叶支持着我

translation.en: Mameha calling, offering me the chance...
translation.zh:
初桃与我为敌 豆叶支持着我 提供机会
让我成为我曾在桥上见过的

translation.en: ...to become one of those elegant women I'd seen on the bridge...
translation.zh:
提供机会
让我成为我曾在桥上见过的 那些风情万种的女人之一

translation.en: ...floating in a silk kimono, the Chairman at my side.
translation.zh:
华美的丝绸和服在身上摆动
会长在我身边

translation.en: Chiyo is my new protégée.
translation.zh: 千代是我新收的妹妹

translation.en: As lovely as her big sister. And with eyes the color of rain.
translation.zh:
跟她的大姐一样美
并且眼睛如雨水一般

translation.en: MAMEHA: The Baron is a very special man to me. My danna.
translation.zh:
男爵对我来说是非常特殊的存在
是我的恩客

translation.en: Someday, if you are fortunate, you will have a patron too.
translation.zh:
如果你足够幸运
将来你也会有这样一位恩客的

translation.en: Don't kneel. You are not a servant girl anymore.
translation.zh: 不用跪下 你已经不是女仆了

translation.en: Step into the light.
translation.zh: 走进光线里来

translation.en: I see water in you.
translation.zh: 我在你眼中看见了水

translation.en: Does that displease you? MAMEHA: Water is powerful.
translation.zh:
-那惹你不高兴了吗？
-水是很强大的东西

translation.en: It can wash away earth, put out fire and even destroy iron.
translation.zh:
它可以冲刷泥土 浇灭大火
甚至毁掉铁

translation.en: But you have not drawn on those strengths, have you?
translation.zh: 但你还没获得这些力量 对吧？

translation.en: About your kimono....
translation.zh: 关于你的和服那件事…

translation.en: You may apologize if you wish.
translation.zh: 如果你想道歉 就道歉吧

translation.en: Why, that is a perfect bow... ...for a pig farmer.
translation.zh:
你这跪礼姿势
对一个养猪的农妇来说倒是不错

translation.en: Don't drop your head. Fingertips together. Elbows in. No weight on the hands.
translation.zh:
头别趴下去 指尖并拢
手肘收进去 重心别放在手上

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 就这样

translation.en: As for the kimono, I'm no fool, Chiyo. Hatsumomo cannot tolerate competition.
translation.zh:
至于那件和服 我不傻 千代
初桃无法容忍竞争对手

translation.en: She is jealous of you?
translation.zh: 她嫉妒你

translation.en: Not me, I'm afraid.
translation.zh: 恐怕她嫉妒的不是我

translation.en: Someone closer to home.
translation.zh: 而是她身边的某人

translation.en: Rise.
translation.zh: 起身

translation.en: Not like a horse.
translation.zh: 别跟匹马一样起来

translation.en: Slide your foot forward.
translation.zh: 脚向前挪一点

translation.en: That's it. Now walk. You are a magnificent geisha.
translation.zh:
就是这样 开始行走
你是个非常出色的艺妓

translation.en: Tell me, Chiyo, does Mrs. Nitta ever speak of the future?
translation.zh:
告诉我 千代
新田太太谈到过未来吗？

translation.en: CHIYO: Not to me.
translation.zh: 没跟我谈过

translation.en: Well, someday soon, she will have to name an heir.
translation.zh: 很快她就得指定一名继承人

translation.en: One of her own geisha to succeed her.
translation.zh: 选一个她手下的艺妓来继承她

translation.en: Strange, isn't it, she has not adopted Hatsumomo.
translation.zh: 很奇怪 对吧？她还没收养初桃

translation.en: That would be like releasing the tiger from its cage.
translation.zh: 那无异于放虎出笼

translation.en: You have a gift for expression.
translation.zh: 你很会说话

translation.en: And if Mrs. Nitta adopts Pumpkin...
translation.zh: 如果新田太太收养了小南瓜

translation.en: ...that is hardly a threat.
translation.zh: 那就构不成威胁了

translation.en: But a young girl with eyes like rain....
translation.zh: 但一个眼睛如雨水般的年轻女孩…

translation.en: But Mrs. Nitta would never choose me. On the contrary, that is our goal.
translation.zh:
-但新田太太永远不会选我的
-恰恰相反 那正是我们的目标

translation.en: -It is? -Of course.
translation.zh:
-真的吗？
-当然了

translation.en: If you do not inherit the okiya, then we will all be at the tiger's mercy.
translation.zh:
如果你无法继承置屋
那我们都将沦落在老虎的淫威之下

translation.en: Water's always in such a hurry.
translation.zh: 水总是流得很湍急

translation.en: Perhaps it is just as well.
translation.zh: 或许这样也挺好的

translation.en: We have no time to lose.
translation.zh: 我们没时间可浪费

translation.en: MAMEHA: We must transform you.
translation.zh: 我们必须尽快改变你

translation.en: And what takes years, you must learn in months.
translation.zh:
别人花几年时间学的东西
你必须在几个月内学会

translation.en: Say I'm entertaining the Baron.
translation.zh: 好比我在伺候男爵的时候

translation.en: Like so many clients, he's trapped in an arranged marriage.
translation.zh:
跟很多客人一样
他也被困在了包办婚姻中

translation.en: So in the teahouse, when he's seeking my company instead...
translation.zh: 在茶屋中 当他寻求我的陪伴的时候

translation.en: ...I reward him like this: With a glimpse of my wrist.
translation.zh: 我会这样回报他 微微露出我的手腕

translation.en: Seeing this demure little trace of naked skin....
translation.zh: 看到这稍稍裸露的皮肤

translation.en: Well, it gives him pleasure.
translation.zh: 会给他带来愉悦感

translation.en: Or when you're sitting down...
translation.zh:
以及 你在坐下的时候
可以轻柔且短暂地

translation.en: ...for the briefest moment, press your leg against his.
translation.zh:
以及 你在坐下的时候
可以轻柔且短暂地 用你的腿擦过他的腿

translation.en: Always by accident, of course.
translation.zh: 当然了 一定要是不经意的

translation.en: CHIYO: Mameha, when does a geisha choose her danna?
translation.zh: 豆叶 艺妓什么时候选择恩客？

translation.en: MAMEHA: I'm afraid it's the other way around.
translation.zh: 恐怕是恩客来选你

translation.en: Focus on your studies, Chiyo. Music, the art of conversation.
translation.zh:
你现在先好好学习 千代
音乐 谈话的艺术

translation.en: That's the surest way to attract a danna. On your feet, not off them.
translation.zh:
那才是吸引恩客万无一失的方式
要有尊严 不能全靠身体

translation.en: MAMEHA: Remember, Chiyo, geisha are not courtesans.
translation.zh: 记住了 千代 艺妓不是妓女 也不是妻子

translation.en: And we are not wives.
translation.zh: 艺妓不是妓女 也不是妻子

translation.en: We sell our skills, not our bodies.
translation.zh: 我们出卖的是才艺 不是身体

translation.en: We create another secret world. A place only of beauty.
translation.zh:
我们创造另一个秘密的世界
一个完全由美构建的地方

translation.en: The very word "geisha" means "artist."
translation.zh: 艺妓这个词的本意就是艺术家

translation.en: And to be a geisha is to be judged as a moving work of art.
translation.zh:
成为艺妓
就是成为一件活的艺术品 供人品评

translation.en: MAMEHA: Agony and beauty, for us, live side by side.
translation.zh:
对我们来说
痛苦与美丽 是相伴相生的

translation.en: Your feet will suffer, your fingers will bleed.
translation.zh: 你的脚会受痛 你的手指会流血

translation.en: Even sitting and sleeping will be painful.
translation.zh: 就连坐着和躺着也会痛苦不堪

translation.en: You cannot call yourself a true geisha...
translation.zh: 真正的艺妓

translation.en: ...until you can stop a man in his tracks with a single look.
translation.zh: 轻轻一瞥 都能让男人驻足

translation.en: No one can do that. Choose someone for me.
translation.zh:
-没人可以做到
-你随便选个男人

translation.en: The gray hat.
translation.zh: 戴灰帽子的那个

translation.en: CHIYO: Choose someone for me, Onei-san.
translation.zh: 你也帮我挑一个 大姐

translation.en: The boy on the bike, with one look.
translation.zh:
骑自行车的那个男孩
只能用一个神情

translation.en: You are ready.
translation.zh: 你的确已经准备好了

translation.en: MOTHER: Hurry up! You are not making money standing there gawking at yourself.
translation.zh:
快点 你傻站在这里
呆呆地看着自己 可挣不到钱

translation.en: For luck!
translation.zh: 祝你好运

translation.en: MAMEHA: This binds us together forever as sisters.
translation.zh: 这将让我们永远像姐妹一样

translation.en: Today you leave your childhood and cast away your name.
translation.zh:
今日 你将告别童年
丢弃旧日的名字

translation.en: From this day forward, you will be known as:
translation.zh: 从今日起 你的名字是…

translation.en: "Sayuri."
translation.zh: 小百合

translation.en: SAYURI: When Mameha granted me my new name...
translation.zh: 豆叶赐我新名字的时候

translation.en: ...I felt little Chiyo disappear behind a white mask with red lips.
translation.zh:
我觉得小千代仿佛消失在了
那带着鲜艳红唇的白色面具之后

translation.en: I was a maiko now. An apprentice geisha.
translation.zh:
我现在成了一名舞伎
一名新入行的艺妓

translation.en: From that moment, I told myself:
translation.zh: 从那一刻起 我告诉自己

translation.en: "When I make tea, when I pour sake...
translation.zh: 当我在斟茶时 倒清酒时

translation.en: ...when I dance, when I tie my obi...
translation.zh: 跳舞时 穿和服时

translation.en: ...it will be for the Chairman.
translation.zh: 一切都是为了会长

translation.en: Until he finds me.
translation.zh: 直到他找到我

translation.en: Until I am his."
translation.zh: 直到我成为他的人

translation.en: Ready?
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？

translation.en: Onei-san.
translation.zh: 大姐

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Friends...
translation.zh: 各位朋友

translation.en: ...we have the pleasure to witness the debut of a new maiko.
translation.zh:
我们有幸见证一位新舞伎的
首次登台表演

translation.en: I remember those eyes. What was her name?
translation.zh: 我记得这双眼睛 她叫什么来着？

translation.en: Sayuri.
translation.zh: 小百合

translation.en: BARON: Determined, isn't she?
translation.zh: 她很坚决啊 对吧？

translation.en: If there'd been a drop of tea in that pot, Sayuri would have gotten it out.
translation.zh:
如果茶壶里有一滴茶的话
小百合一定会给倒出来的

translation.en: MAMEHA: Don't tease, Baron, it is her very first time.
translation.zh:
我跟你说过了 男爵先生
今天是她首次登台

translation.en: What a beautiful dance, yes, Pumpkin?
translation.zh: 舞跳得真美 对吧？小南瓜

translation.en: Her fans are so hypnotic... ...that you never notice her feet.
translation.zh:
她的扇子太有催眠效果了
让人都注意不到她的脚

translation.en: -What's her name? MAMEHA: Her name is Sayuri.
translation.zh:
-她叫什么名字？
-小百合

translation.en: Sayuri? A name as sweet as she is.
translation.zh: 小百合？真是人如其名 都一样甜美

translation.en: I'm afraid these days... ...even a common chambermaid can call herself a geisha.
translation.zh:
恐怕这年头就连打扫卫生的女仆
也能自称是艺妓了

translation.en: So it's nice to see such a sincere young maiko. Isn't it?
translation.zh:
能见到真么年轻的舞伎可真好
对吧？

translation.en: Why, yes.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Surely you would like to thank Hatsumomo... ...for her gracious compliments.
translation.zh: 快谢谢初桃慷慨的夸赞

translation.en: There is so much I would like to say to Hatsumomo.
translation.zh: 我有好多话要对初桃说

translation.en: Sometimes the smartest remark is silence.
translation.zh: 有时候 沉默是金

translation.en: What better advice to follow than your own?
translation.zh:
自己的建议那么好
怎么不说到做到呢？

translation.en: MAMEHA: Sayuri.
translation.zh: 小百合

translation.en: -I was a maiko myself once. SAYURI: Of course.
translation.zh:
-我也曾是舞伎
-当然了

translation.en: But it's been such a very long...
translation.zh: 但那已经是很久…

translation.en: ...long, long, long time.
translation.zh: 很久、很久、很久前的事了

translation.en: I shall destroy you.
translation.zh: 我要毁了你

translation.en: MAMEHA: She can destroy you. She will spread rumors...
translation.zh:
她的确有能力毁了你 她会散播关于你的谣言
跟着你去每一个茶屋 抢走你的客人

translation.en: ...stalk you from teahouse to teahouse, then steal your clients.
translation.zh:
她会散播关于你的谣言
跟着你去每一个茶屋 抢走你的客人

translation.en: All in the hope that Mrs. Nitta adopts Pumpkin instead of you.
translation.zh: 好让新田太太收养小南瓜 而不是你

translation.en: -What can we do? -We've got to outwit her.
translation.zh:
-我们能怎么办？
-我们得智胜她

translation.en: To find a place somewhere beyond her reach...
translation.zh: 找一个她的魔爪触及不到的地方

translation.en: ...where you can practice your skills without any interference.
translation.zh:
在那里 你可以好好练习你的技能
不被打扰

translation.en: -Your first sumo match. -What?
translation.zh:
-你的第一场相扑比赛
-什么？

translation.en: MAMEHA: Today you will meet Iwamura Ken.
translation.zh: 今天 你将见到岩村坚

translation.en: He is head of the Iwamura Electric Company in Osaka.
translation.zh: 他是大阪岩村电气公司的老板

translation.en: My client for years.
translation.zh: 曾是我持续多年的客人

translation.en: We will entertain him and his partner, Nobu.
translation.zh: 我们要取悦他和他的合伙人延

translation.en: We may find Nobu quite a challenge. He does not like geisha.
translation.zh:
延可能比较难以应付
他不喜欢艺妓

translation.en: MAMEHA: Be attentive. I will do the rest.
translation.zh: 专心点 剩下的交给我

translation.en: Chairman Iwamura. President Nobu. This is my new younger sister, Sayuri.
translation.zh:
岩村会长、延社长
这是我新认的妹妹小百合

translation.en: CHAIRMAN: Nobu-san.
translation.zh: 延先生

translation.en: Nobu-san.
translation.zh: 延先生

translation.en: [IN ENGLISH] Injured in Manchuria. War hero.
translation.zh: 他是个战争英雄 在满洲受过伤

translation.en: Sayuri, is this your first sumo match?
translation.zh:
小百合
这是你第一次观看相扑比赛吗？

translation.en: Nobu-san will have to educate you. I cannot tell one wrestler from the next.
translation.zh:
只能让延先生跟你讲解了
我连两个相扑手谁是谁都分不清

translation.en: That is the Chairman's diplomatic way of saying he hates sumo.
translation.zh: 那是会长在委婉地表示他很讨厌相扑

translation.en: CHAIRMAN: Did you notice our contribution?
translation.zh: 看到我们的贡献了吗？

translation.en: We are harnessing the power of water...
translation.zh: 我们操控水的力量产生电

translation.en: ...to bring electricity to some of the smaller villages.
translation.zh: 我们操控水的力量产生电 然后向一些小村庄供电

translation.en: -It was in the newspapers, wasn't it? -With the Chairman's picture.
translation.zh:
-见报了 对吧？
-没错 他们刊登了会长的照片

translation.en: You compensate for all my shortcomings, don't you?
translation.zh: 你弥补了我一切的不足 对吧？

translation.en: May I ask, how does someone harness the power of water?
translation.zh:
我能否问问
人要怎么控制水的力量？

translation.en: You should never ask an engineer to explain a thing, because he will--
translation.zh:
你永远不该让工程师解释一件事
因为他真会长篇大论的

translation.en: Let the girl watch sumo.
translation.zh: 让这姑娘好好看相扑比赛吧

translation.en: Hatsumomo, that snake. Quick, turn your attention to Nobu.
translation.zh: 初桃 那个毒妇 快 把你的注意力转到延身上

translation.en: But, Mameha-neisan--
translation.zh: 但是 豆叶小姐…

translation.en: Hatsumomo finds him repulsive. She'd never steal him away.
translation.zh:
初桃觉得他很恶心
她永远不会把他抢走的

translation.en: Mislead her. Go.
translation.zh: 误导她 上吧

translation.en: Perhaps Nobu-san will be kind enough to explain the rules of the match.
translation.zh:
延先生能否好心地
跟小女子说说比赛规则呢？

translation.en: Three things matter in life: sumo, business and war.
translation.zh:
人生中有三样东西是最重要的
相扑、生意和战争

translation.en: Understand one, you know them all.
translation.zh:
搞明白其中一样
你就全部都能明白了

translation.en: But why should a geisha care?
translation.zh: 一个艺妓为什么要在乎这些呢？

translation.en: You spend your time plucking strings and dancing.
translation.zh: 你的时间都用来弹琴跳舞了

translation.en: I humbly beg to differ.
translation.zh: 请恕小女子不敢苟同

translation.en: What is sumo but a dance between giants?
translation.zh: 相扑其实也是两个巨人间的舞蹈

translation.en: What is business but a dance between companies?
translation.zh: 生意也是公司间的舞蹈

translation.en: I'd like to know about every kind of dance.
translation.zh: 我想了解每一种舞蹈

translation.en: They are throwing salt to purify the ring.
translation.zh:
撒盐仪式
他们在通过撒盐来净化相扑台

translation.en: That man is Miyagiyama, the greatest fighter in Japan.
translation.zh:
那个人叫宫城山
日本最出色的相扑手

translation.en: SAYURI: But he's so tiny.
translation.zh: 但他身形好小

translation.en: NOBU: Only compared to his opponent.
translation.zh: 只是跟对手比比较小而已

translation.en: Miyagiyama may use hataki komi.
translation.zh: 宫城山可能会用“叩击”这一招

translation.en: NOBU: Are you listening? Yes.
translation.zh:
-你在听吗？
-是的

translation.en: Hataki komi is a movement the smaller combatant uses...
translation.zh: 叩击是身形较小的相扑选手常用的

translation.en: ...to throw the larger man off balance.
translation.zh: 让体型较大的选手失去平衡的招数

translation.en: Victory does not always belong to the powerful.
translation.zh: 胜利并非总是属于力量大的那一方

translation.en: Look. There. In his eyes.
translation.zh: 你看 他眼睛中的神采

translation.en: I'm afraid our time has come to a close.
translation.zh: 恐怕我们的时间快到了

translation.en: -Going so soon? -Not yet. I want her to see.
translation.zh:
-这么快就走？
-先别走 我想让她见到这一幕

translation.en: Now that is hataki komi! I see now why you like sumo.
translation.zh:
-那才叫叩击
-我现在明白你为什么喜欢相扑了

translation.en: You can never judge a man's power by his appearance alone.
translation.zh: 永远不要以貌取人

translation.en: Mameha.
translation.zh: 豆叶

translation.en: You may bring her again.
translation.zh: 你下次可以再把她带来

translation.en: SAYURI: I scoured the newspaper for the Chairman's photograph.
translation.zh: 我在报纸上到处翻会长的照片

translation.en: Anything to preserve our moment together.
translation.zh: 以各种方式珍藏我们在一起的时刻

translation.en: A moment stolen...
translation.zh: 那一刻被偷走了

translation.en: ...when I was forced to turn my attention to Nobu.
translation.zh: 当时我被迫将注意力转向延

translation.en: In that instant, I felt the world shift.
translation.zh: 在那一刻 我觉得世界倾覆了

translation.en: But not my own determination.
translation.zh: 但我的决心未变

translation.en: I made a secret promise:
translation.zh: 我暗暗许下一个承诺

translation.en: Along with his picture, I would lock away my heart...
translation.zh:
我将把我的心 和他的照片一起封锁起来
此生只留给他

translation.en: ...and save it for him.
translation.zh:
和他的照片一起封锁起来
此生只留给他

translation.en: -Onei-san. MAMEHA: Come in.
translation.zh:
-大姐
-过来

translation.en: Tonight we will deliver a quick blow to Hatsumomo. Hataki komi.
translation.zh:
今晚我们要快速打击一下初桃
就像叩击战术

translation.en: -How? -We will meet Nobu-san...
translation.zh: 怎么做？ 我们将去纲岛餐厅跟延先生见面

translation.en: ...at the Tsunashima restaurant.
translation.zh: 我们将去纲岛餐厅跟延先生见面

translation.en: But first, a visit to Dr. Crab.
translation.zh:
-但首先要去见一下螃蟹医生
-螃蟹医生？

translation.en: -Dr. Crab? -It's a little nickname...
translation.zh:
-但首先要去见一下螃蟹医生
-螃蟹医生？ 那是他多年来赢得的外号

translation.en: -...he's earned over the years. -Onei-san!
translation.zh:
那是他多年来赢得的外号 -大姐
-别动

translation.en: MAMEHA: Hold still.
translation.zh:
-大姐
-别动

translation.en: I have something in mind. A plan. Now cut your leg where I've marked it.
translation.zh:
我有个计划
把我刚刚标记的地方划伤

translation.en: -What? -Or I will do it for you--
translation.zh:
什么？ -否则我就亲自动手了
-你疯了吗？

translation.en: Have you gone mad?
translation.zh:
-否则我就亲自动手了
-你疯了吗？

translation.en: Do you trust me or don't you?
translation.zh: 你到底信不信任我？

translation.en: Well?
translation.zh: 怎么样？

translation.en: Go ahead, do it.
translation.zh: 来 动手吧

translation.en: Careless with the sewing scissors, were you?
translation.zh: 是握剪刀时不小心划伤的吧？

translation.en: Right through your beautiful kimono. Such a pity.
translation.zh: 把你美丽的和服都划破了 真遗憾

translation.en: MAMEHA: It won't leave a scar, will it?
translation.zh: 不会留下伤疤的吧？

translation.en: Sayuri is a special girl at a very special time in her life.
translation.zh:
小百合是个非常独特的女孩
现在正处于她人生中非常独特的时期

translation.en: DR. CRAB: Yes. With those eyes, you must be quite a commodity.
translation.zh:
当然 就凭这双眼睛
你一定是奇货可居

translation.en: Clean cut.
translation.zh: 伤口整齐

translation.en: Won't leave a mark, I promise.
translation.zh: 我保证不会留下疤痕的

translation.en: But I had best prescribe a bit of antiseptic.
translation.zh: 但我最好给你开点杀菌药

translation.en: SAYURI: Your honorable sister says, "Cut your leg," you cut your leg.
translation.zh:
你尊敬的大姐说：“把你的腿划伤”
你就把你的腿划伤

translation.en: She says, "Follow me," you follow her.
translation.zh:
她说：“跟我来”
你就跟着她走就行了

translation.en: My life had turned into a game... ...and only she knew the rules.
translation.zh:
我的人生已经变成了一场游戏
只有她清楚游戏规则

translation.en: Ekubo. At the right moment, slip it to Nobu discreetly.
translation.zh:
这是酒窝米糕 找个合适的时机
悄悄把它递给延先生

translation.en: He will know what it means.
translation.zh: 他会明白是什么意思的

translation.en: -You have kept us waiting. MAMEHA: Please, forgive us, Nobu-san.
translation.zh:
-你让我们等了好久
-请原谅 延先生

translation.en: The Chairman thinks I should take more pleasure in life. Music and the theater.
translation.zh:
会长认为我应该多享受生活
听听音乐 去去剧院什么的

translation.en: What is your impression?
translation.zh: 你是什么看法？

translation.en: It is useless to push a cart sideways.
translation.zh: 直行的车子是无法横着推的

translation.en: One could not wish Nobu-san to be anyone but Nobu-san.
translation.zh:
任何人都不该希望延先生失去自我
变成另一个人

translation.en: I could not agree more.
translation.zh: 我真是再赞同不过了

translation.en: I owe this man everything.
translation.zh: 我的一切都是因为他的恩赐

translation.en: NOBU: He gives me too much credit, as usual.
translation.zh: 他一如既往地过奖了

translation.en: -Probably. Kanpai. ALL: Kanpai.
translation.zh:
-或许吧 干杯
-干杯

translation.en: It is a trinket. I found it a few days ago.
translation.zh: 这是个小饰品 我几天前找到的

translation.en: Nobu-san. I had no idea you were so sentimental.
translation.zh: 延先生 我以前都不知道你如此感性呢

translation.en: Call it my new leaf.
translation.zh: 就当是我新的一面吧

translation.en: My mother....
translation.zh: 我母亲…

translation.en: My mother, she used to wear something similar.
translation.zh: 我母亲以前也经常戴类似的饰物

translation.en: You do not like it?
translation.zh: 你不喜欢我吗？

translation.en: Forgive me. I've never received a present before.
translation.zh: 请原谅 我以前从未收到过礼物

translation.en: What a beautiful comb.
translation.zh: 这梳子可真漂亮

translation.en: Such a joyous moment, Sayuri.
translation.zh: 真是令人高兴的时刻 小百合

translation.en: You are finally getting what you deserve.
translation.zh: 你终于开始得到你理应得到的东西了

translation.en: How lovely.
translation.zh: 真漂亮

translation.en: And now, will you excuse us, please? We have another engagement.
translation.zh:
失陪了 请原谅
我们还要去赴另一场约

translation.en: Many, in fact.
translation.zh: 实际上 是很多约

translation.en: Pumpkin.
translation.zh: 小南瓜？

translation.en: You are most kind.
translation.zh: 你真的很好心

translation.en: Now, give this one to Dr. Crab.
translation.zh:
-把这个拿去给螃蟹医生
-豆叶 别这样

translation.en: -Mameha, please. -You're upset?
translation.zh:
-把这个拿去给螃蟹医生
-豆叶 别这样 -你不高兴？
-我想信任你 真的

translation.en: I want to trust you, I do. But you have to tell me what's going on.
translation.zh:
-你不高兴？
-我想信任你 真的 但你必须告诉我到底是怎么回事

translation.en: I am ensuring your future. But tell me how. I beg you.
translation.zh:
-我在巩固你的未来
-告诉我吧 求你了

translation.en: I'm trying to orchestrate a bidding war.
translation.zh: 我在谋划一场竞价大战

translation.en: -What for? -Your most precious attribute.
translation.zh:
-竞拍什么？
-你最宝贵的东西

translation.en: -And what is that? -Your mizuage.
translation.zh:
-是什么？
-你的初夜

translation.en: Did Mother ever tell you about the eel in the cave?
translation.zh: 姆妈跟你说过鳗鱼进洞的故事吗？

translation.en: Well, every once in a while... ...a man's eel likes to visit a woman's cave.
translation.zh:
每隔一段时间
男人的鳗鱼就会想进入女人的洞穴

translation.en: -Yes, I know. -You do?
translation.zh:
-我知道
-真的吗？

translation.en: I live with Hatsumomo.
translation.zh: 毕竟我跟初桃住在一起

translation.en: Your cave is untouched. Men like that.
translation.zh:
你的洞穴是尚未有人碰过的
男人就喜欢这种

translation.en: We call this mizuage.
translation.zh: 我们称之为初夜

translation.en: And to become a full geisha, you must sell it to the highest bidder.
translation.zh:
要成为真正的艺妓
我们必须把初夜卖给出价最高的人

translation.en: Did you sell yours?
translation.zh:
-你的也卖了吗？
-我的售价是有史以来最高的

translation.en: The largest sum ever paid. Ten thousand yen.
translation.zh:
-你的也卖了吗？
-我的售价是有史以来最高的 10000日元

translation.en: I freed myself from debt. And so will you.
translation.zh: 我借此还清了债务 你也可以的

translation.en: When you slip the rice cake to Dr. Crab...
translation.zh: 你把酒窝米糕送给螃蟹医生的时候

translation.en: ...it is a sign that says your mizuage is ripe for sale.
translation.zh:
就是在暗示你已经成熟
初夜可以出售了

translation.en: The doctor has no desire to see you tonight. Or any night.
translation.zh:
医生今晚或其他任何时候
都不想见你们

translation.en: Pumpkin. Hatsumomo went to see Dr. Crab, yes?
translation.zh:
小南瓜
初桃去见过螃蟹医生了 对吧？

translation.en: I have to go, Chiyo-chan.
translation.zh: 我得走了 千代

translation.en: -Didn't she? -I do not know.
translation.zh:
-是不是？
-我不知道

translation.en: Of course you know. You shadow her every step.
translation.zh: 你当然知道 你对她如影随形

translation.en: You expect me to betray my big sister? Has she made you cruel as well?
translation.zh:
-你这是在让我背叛我的大姐
-她让你也变成了残忍的人吗？

translation.en: -No. -My Pumpkin always told the truth.
translation.zh:
-没有
-我认识的小南瓜只会跟我说实话

translation.en: But....
translation.zh: 但是…

translation.en: The truth.
translation.zh: 说实话

translation.en: Tonight we went to the teahouse to see Dr. Crab.
translation.zh: 今晚 我们去茶屋见螃蟹医生

translation.en: I sat outside, but I could still hear through the screen.
translation.zh:
我就坐在外面
但隔着屏风还是能听到里面的声音

translation.en: And Hatsumomo then said to him: "I live in the same okiya as Sayuri.
translation.zh:
初桃对他说：
“我跟小百合住在同一个置屋

translation.en: Did you know that she brings men back to her room?"
translation.zh: 你知道她经常带男人回房吗？”

translation.en: "No," he said. "Common sailors and fishermen too."
translation.zh:
他说不知道 然后初桃说：
“甚至包括低等水手和渔夫”

translation.en: The doctor looked queasy, like he didn't want to hear any more.
translation.zh: 医生似乎快吐了 简直听不下去了

translation.en: But she kept going.
translation.zh: 但她还在继续说

translation.en: And Hatsumomo said to him, "What's the matter? Have I told you more than you wanted to know?"
translation.zh:
初桃说：“怎么了？
我透露了一些你不想知道的事吗？”

translation.en: I'm so sorry. I wanted to say something...
translation.zh:
我真的很抱歉 我当时也想说点什么的
但我怎么能开口呢？小千代

translation.en: ...but how could I, Chiyo-chan? How?
translation.zh:
我当时也想说点什么的
但我怎么能开口呢？小千代 怎么开口？

translation.en: Am I really like her? Am I?
translation.zh: 我真的变成她那样了吗？是吗？

translation.en: Of course not.
translation.zh: 当然没有

translation.en: Is Mameha-san cruel to you too?
translation.zh: 豆叶小姐对你也很残酷吗？

translation.en: No. She's so kind to me.
translation.zh: 不 她对我很好

translation.en: But sometimes I worry she's taking me further from the things I want.
translation.zh:
但有时候 我有点担心
她让我离我的目标更远了

translation.en: That man Nobu.
translation.zh: 那个男人 延

translation.en: Do you really like him?
translation.zh: 你真的喜欢他吗？

translation.en: -No. -That's what I thought.
translation.zh:
-不
-我也是这么认为的

translation.en: Do you like somebody else?
translation.zh: 你有别的心上人？

translation.en: Don't worry about me, Chiyo-chan, I'll be fine. Better than fine.
translation.zh:
别担心我 小千代
我会没事的 好得很

translation.en: Mother plans to adopt me...
translation.zh: 姆妈打算收养我

translation.en: ...so my dream of having someplace to live out my life may come true.
translation.zh:
所以我想有个安身之所的梦想
或许真的能实现

translation.en: I have to go.
translation.zh: 我得走了

translation.en: MAMEHA: We could still win, Sayuri.
translation.zh:
-我们还是可以获胜的 小百合
-怎么获胜？

translation.en: How? Hatsumomo has poisoned Dr. Crab against me.
translation.zh:
-我们还是可以获胜的 小百合
-怎么获胜？ 初桃已经挑拨得螃蟹医生憎恶我了

translation.en: Forget about him. There are plenty of other fish in the sea.
translation.zh: 别管他了 我们完全可以找别的人

translation.en: -The Chairman has been kind-- -Sayuri.
translation.zh:
-会长一直很好心地…
-小百合

translation.en: Nobu and the Chairman are business partners.
translation.zh: 延和会长是生意伙伴

translation.en: They would never bid against one another.
translation.zh: 他们永远不会互相竞价的

translation.en: It is time we cast a wider net.
translation.zh: 是时候撒一张更大的网了

translation.en: MAMEHA: Suppose there was a night in Miyako...
translation.zh: 假设京都的某个夜晚

translation.en: ...hundreds of men, all in one place...
translation.zh:
成百上千的男人集中在一处
急切地争夺你

translation.en: -...eager to bid for you. SAYURI: What do you mean?
translation.zh:
成百上千的男人集中在一处
急切地争夺你 你是什么意思？

translation.en: MAMEHA: Where you are the object of all their fantasies.
translation.zh: 你是他们所有人梦寐以求的对象

translation.en: The most famous geisha in the hanamachi.
translation.zh: 是花街最出名的艺妓

translation.en: SAYURI: But I'm not. MAMEHA: You will be.
translation.zh:
-但我不是
-你会是的

translation.en: HATSUMOMO: Who is responsible for this?
translation.zh: 这是谁干的？

translation.en: MOTHER: Ask Mameha.
translation.zh: 问豆叶去

translation.en: I'm asking you, Okasan. How come Sayuri gets to be the lead?
translation.zh:
-我在问你 姆妈
-小百合怎么成主角了？

translation.en: It's your own fault. You should practice more.
translation.zh:
那是你自己的错
你应该多勤加练习的

translation.en: What did Mameha do?
translation.zh: 豆叶干了什么？

translation.en: Speak to the director in private?
translation.zh: 竟然私下里去找负责人？

translation.en: Not every geisha uses that kind of currency.
translation.zh: 并非每个艺妓都会用这种手段

translation.en: I'm looking forward to your performance.
translation.zh: 我真的很期待你的表现呢

translation.en: You know how I adore watching you dance, Chiyo.
translation.zh: 你知道我有多喜欢看你跳舞 千代

translation.en: They've all come. The Baron, Nobu-san...
translation.zh:
他们都来了 男爵、延先生
以及亲爱的初桃

translation.en: ...our beloved Hatsumomo and that dapper General of hers.
translation.zh:
他们都来了 男爵、延先生
以及亲爱的初桃 以及她的那个将军

translation.en: Anybody else? And even your old friend, Dr. Crab.
translation.zh:
-还有其他人吗？
-甚至你的老朋友螃蟹医生也来了

translation.en: Onei-san. What if I dance poorly?
translation.zh: 大姐 如果我跳得很差怎么办？

translation.en: What if I disgrace myself and no one takes interest--? Shh.
translation.zh:
如果我出了丑
没人对我感兴趣怎么办？

translation.en: You will be glorious.
translation.zh: 你一定会美得令人窒息

translation.en: Now it's time.
translation.zh: 是时候了

translation.en: Sayuri, you remember the doctor.
translation.zh: 小百合 你还记得医生吧？

translation.en: I hope my performance pleased you, doctor.
translation.zh: 希望你喜欢我的表演 医生

translation.en: Oh, you dance with such profound feeling.
translation.zh: 你的舞蹈中充满了激情

translation.en: I most humbly thank you.
translation.zh: 非常感谢你

translation.en: It seems you've once again caught the doctor's interest.
translation.zh: 你似乎再次激起医生的兴趣了

translation.en: SAYURI: And I am most grateful.
translation.zh: 我非常感激

translation.en: -If you have heard any gossip... -Ah, yes?
translation.zh:
-如果你听说了什么流言蜚语…
-什么？

translation.en: ...then I hope you will follow your own advice.
translation.zh: 那我希望你能遵从自己的建议

translation.en: And what would that be, pray tell?
translation.zh: 告诉我 是什么建议？

translation.en: Seek a second opinion.
translation.zh: 问问其他人

translation.en: BARON: Ah, Chairman.
translation.zh: 会长

translation.en: Sayuri gave such a passionate performance, don't you think?
translation.zh: 小百合的表演真是充满激情 对吧？

translation.en: CHAIRMAN: Indeed.
translation.zh: 确实如此

translation.en: Mameha, did you invite the Chairman to my estate this weekend?
translation.zh:
豆叶 你邀请会长
周末去我的府上了吗？

translation.en: It's my annual blossom-viewing party.
translation.zh:
-是我每年一度的赏花大会
-男爵 我跟你说了我去不了

translation.en: Baron, I told you I can't go. I have an urgent appointment.
translation.zh:
-是我每年一度的赏花大会
-男爵 我跟你说了我去不了 我有紧急的事要处理

translation.en: Taking care of a little nuisance? Or was that a naughty secret?
translation.zh:
解决一个小麻烦
还是说这是不可告人的秘密？

translation.en: Baron, wouldn't Sayuri look stunning... ...among the flowers on your estate?
translation.zh:
男爵 小百合如果站在贵府的花丛中
一定会美丽无比吧？

translation.en: Yes, very pretty. Be sure to send her along.
translation.zh:
是啊 非常美丽
务必到时把她送过去

translation.en: HATSUMOMO: With a chaperone, of course. I'm certain Mr. Bekku will oblige.
translation.zh:
当然还需要一个监护人
我相信别宫先生一定乐意效劳

translation.en: That's a fine idea, Baron. But Sayuri is required at the theater.
translation.zh:
真是个好主意 男爵
但剧院那边需要小百合去演出

translation.en: Mameha, I expect her there.
translation.zh: 豆叶 我指望她能到场

translation.en: -Nobu. NOBU: Huh? BARON: Coming Saturday?
translation.zh: 延 周六去吗？

translation.en: All that way to see a cherry tree? I will leave that to the Chairman.
translation.zh:
跑那么远去看樱花树？
还是让会长去吧

translation.en: Wonderful tonight. Excuse me.
translation.zh: 你今晚很出色 失陪了

translation.en: If you would rather not go....
translation.zh: 如果你不想去…

translation.en: I'd like to go very much.
translation.zh: 我非常想去

translation.en: Then be on your guard, every moment.
translation.zh: 那你一定要时刻警惕

translation.en: MAMEHA: There is a reason Hatsumomo wants you there.
translation.zh: 初桃希望你过去肯定是有所企图

translation.en: Trust me, I know my Baron, Sayuri.
translation.zh: 相信我 我了解男爵 小百合

translation.en: He has a weakness for beautiful women.
translation.zh: 他在美丽的女人面前没有招架之力

translation.en: And now you are the most celebrated geisha in all Miyako.
translation.zh: 现在 你成了京都最负盛名的艺妓

translation.en: The most desired as well.
translation.zh: 男人都对你趋之若鹜

translation.en: CHAIRMAN: Pardon. Pardon me. Pardon me. Sayuri. Today, even the cherry blossoms are envious of her.
translation.zh:
小百合 今天
即便是盛放的樱花也嫉妒她的美貌

translation.en: CHAIRMAN: There's something I've been wanting to say to you... ...for some time now.
translation.zh: 有件事我想对你说已经挺久了

translation.en: I'd like to....
translation.zh: 我想…

translation.en: To thank you for your attention to Nobu-san.
translation.zh: 谢谢你花心思在延先生身上

translation.en: Nobu can be a difficult man. So severe.
translation.zh:
延有时是个不好对付的人 他很严厉
讨厌宴会 喝酒也只喝到适度的程度

translation.en: Hates parties, sake only in moderation.
translation.zh:
他很严厉
讨厌宴会 喝酒也只喝到适度的程度

translation.en: And he disdains geisha.
translation.zh: 并且他瞧不起艺妓

translation.en: But he....
translation.zh: 但他…

translation.en: He's fond of you.
translation.zh: 很喜欢你

translation.en: Because you admire him, I respect him more.
translation.zh: 因为你钦佩他 我也对他更尊重了

translation.en: He will never tell you himself. He's far too modest.
translation.zh:
他永远不会直接开口告诉你
他太谦逊了

translation.en: We were fighting in Manchuria together. There was an explosion.
translation.zh:
我们曾一起在满洲上过战场
有一次遇到了爆炸

translation.en: He protected me from the worst of it.
translation.zh: 他保护了我 让我没有受重伤

translation.en: As you might imagine, I owe him quite a debt.
translation.zh: 你应该可以想象 我欠他很多

translation.en: Nobu has taught me a great deal. Patience, for one thing.
translation.zh: 延教会了我很多东西 比如耐心

translation.en: I, in turn, have tried to teach him... ...you have to savor life while you can.
translation.zh:
我也试图教他一些东西
比如 要及时享受人生

translation.en: The lesson of the cherry blossom.
translation.zh: 樱花的意义

translation.en: That is why Nobu likes you.
translation.zh: 就是因为这样 延才会喜欢你

translation.en: We must not expect happiness, Sayuri. It is not something we deserve.
translation.zh:
我们不能期望幸福 小百合
那是我们不配得到的东西

translation.en: When life goes well, it's a sudden gift.
translation.zh:
生活顺利的时候
那就是突然而来的礼物

translation.en: It cannot last forever.
translation.zh: 但它无法长久

translation.en: BARON: Ah, Sayuri.
translation.zh: 小百合

translation.en: There you are. I have a present for you.
translation.zh: 你在这儿 我有份礼物要送给你

translation.en: Mameha asked me to show you my kimono collection.
translation.zh: 豆叶让我给你看看我收藏的和服

translation.en: It's quite venerated.
translation.zh: 非常珍贵

translation.en: My grandfather and father collected kimono before me.
translation.zh:
我祖父和我父亲
在我之前就开始收藏和服了

translation.en: I've given a number of valuable kimono to Mameha.
translation.zh: 我赠送过豆叶很多珍贵的和服

translation.en: I like to give present to beautiful girls.
translation.zh: 我喜欢送礼物给美丽的女孩

translation.en: It's for you.
translation.zh: 这件是给你的

translation.en: Come. Have a closer look.
translation.zh: 来 仔细看看

translation.en: Isn't it lovely?
translation.zh: 很漂亮吧？

translation.en: Try it on.
translation.zh: 穿上试试

translation.en: The Baron is too kind.
translation.zh: 男爵先生实在太好心了

translation.en: I will happily try it on with Mameha when the Baron returns to Miyako.
translation.zh:
等男爵下次去京都
我会穿上 跟豆叶一起接待你

translation.en: Who knows when that will be? Put it on now. Don't be shy.
translation.zh:
谁知道那要等到什么时候呢？
现在就穿上吧 别害羞

translation.en: Don't worry.
translation.zh: 别担心

translation.en: I am experienced in knotting obis. And untying them as well.
translation.zh:
我很擅长给和服的腰带打结
也很擅长解开它们

translation.en: Please. Mr. Bekku is waiting. Bekku is waiting for no one.
translation.zh:
-别这样 别宫先生还等着我
-别宫可没在等任何人

translation.en: SAYURI: Please!
translation.zh: 求你了

translation.en: Stop!
translation.zh: 住手

translation.en: Please! Stop now!
translation.zh: 求你了 立刻住手

translation.en: Sayuri.... I only want to have a look.
translation.zh: 小百合 我只是想看看而已

translation.en: No harm in that.
translation.zh: 那有什么大不了的

translation.en: Any man would do the same.
translation.zh: 任何男人都会这么做的

translation.en: MAMEHA: I heard a message on the wind. So careless.
translation.zh: 我听到一些传闻 你真是太不小心了

translation.en: -You have ruined all our plans. -I did nothing.
translation.zh: 你毁了我们全部的计划

translation.en: Please, Sayuri, do not insult me. I know the Baron better than that.
translation.zh:
-我什么都没干
-小百合 别侮辱我的智慧 -我非常了解男爵
-他送了我一件和服

translation.en: He gave me a kimono.
translation.zh:
-我非常了解男爵
-他送了我一件和服

translation.en: -You sold yourself for a kimono. -I did not sell myself!
translation.zh: 你为了件和服就把自己卖了 我没有把自己卖了

translation.en: Today is the day I accept bids for your mizuage.
translation.zh: 今天我将接受对你初夜的竞价

translation.en: What kind of price can I hope to demand... ...with a finger pointed at your back?
translation.zh:
但现在你的名声被玷污了
我还指望你能卖出个什么好价钱？

translation.en: He looked at me, that's all, Onei-san.
translation.zh:
他只是看了我的身子
仅此而已 大姐

translation.en: You will be examined at the mizuage ceremony.
translation.zh:
在竞拍仪式上
将会有人检查你的处女身

translation.en: If you are found to be worthless.... I am not worthless!
translation.zh:
-如果发现你是没有价值的废物…
-我不是没有价值的废物

translation.en: I am not worthless.
translation.zh: 我不是没有价值的废物

translation.en: HATSUMOMO: How much longer is this bidding going to take?
translation.zh: 这场竞价到底还要多久？

translation.en: Besides, who wants a plum when someone has already had a bite?
translation.zh:
再说了 谁会想要一个
已经被别人啃过一口的李子？

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 卖了多少钱？

translation.en: Twenty yen? Thirty?
translation.zh: 20日元 还是30日元？

translation.en: This can't be the right amount.
translation.zh: 这数目肯定是搞错了吧

translation.en: I trust you agree. I have won the wager.
translation.zh: 我想你也一定同意 打赌是我赢了

translation.en: Sayuri's made history.
translation.zh:
小百合创造了历史
没有任何人的初夜卖的价钱比她更高

translation.en: No mizuage has ever been sold for more. Not even mine.
translation.zh:
小百合创造了历史
没有任何人的初夜卖的价钱比她更高 就连我的也比不上

translation.en: Fifteen thousand yen.
Unbelievable.
translation.zh: 难以置信

translation.en: Of course, none of it will go to Sayuri.
translation.zh:
谢谢你 大姐 当然了 这些钱一点都不会归小百合
或是你 豆叶

translation.en: Or to you, Mameha. It goes to this okiya.
translation.zh:
当然了 这些钱一点都不会归小百合
或是你 豆叶 全部都要归这个置屋

translation.en: All 15,000 yen to this estate.
translation.zh: 全部的15000日元都归这里

translation.en: I do not understand.
translation.zh: 我不明白

translation.en: That Sayuri will inherit as my adopted daughter.
translation.zh: 小百合会作为我的养女继承置屋

translation.en: -What? HATSUMOMO: You wouldn't dare.
translation.zh: 什么？ 你敢

translation.en: I'm entitled to do as I choose.
translation.zh: 我有权做出任何选择

translation.en: But you promised the okiya to Pumpkin!
translation.zh: 但你曾答应要把这个置屋留给小南瓜

translation.en: Look at her. Still a virgin maiko.
translation.zh: 你瞧瞧她 到现在还是个处女舞伎

translation.en: -Pumpkin! -Can't you adopt us both?
translation.zh:
-小南瓜
-你不能收养我们两个吗？

translation.en: Quiet, Sayuri. I'm no fool.
translation.zh: 闭嘴 小百合 我可不傻

translation.en: Pumpkin would only be Hatsumomo's puppet.
translation.zh: 小南瓜永远只可能是初桃的傀儡

translation.en: How long will it take before you kick us out onto the street?
translation.zh:
要不了多久
你会把我们都赶到大街上去吧？

translation.en: HATSUMOMO: I have given you my life.
translation.zh: 我把我这一辈子都献给了你

translation.en: Yes. Your impudence. Your foul temper.
translation.zh: 是啊 你的厚颜无耻、你的臭脾气

translation.en: Who paid for the silk on your back? The rice in your bowl?
translation.zh: 你身上穿的丝绸是谁赚的钱买的？ 你每天吃的饭？

translation.en: The tobacco in that pipe of yours? Who?
translation.zh: 以及你吸的烟？

translation.en: Don't exaggerate! You have never even had a danna.
translation.zh:
-是谁赚的钱？
-别夸张 你连个恩客都没有

translation.en: Don't say it. Don't say-- MOTHER: You chose that no-good Koichi.
translation.zh:
-别说这种话…
-你选了那个废物幸一

translation.en: Stop it.
translation.zh:
-别说了
-他每天晚上都翻窗

translation.en: Sneaking through your window at all hours of the night.
translation.zh:
-别说了
-他每天晚上都翻窗 -进入你的房间
-闭嘴

translation.en: HATSUMOMO: Quiet!
translation.zh:
-进入你的房间
-闭嘴

translation.en: Not like a geisha. Like a common prostitute.
translation.zh:
你一点都不像艺妓
倒像个普通的妓女

translation.en: MOTHER: Besides, you are getting old.
translation.zh: 再说了 你日渐人老珠黄

translation.en: But Sayuri?
translation.zh: 但小百合…

translation.en: Sayuri is destined to become a legend. Huh?
translation.zh: 小百合注定要成为传奇

translation.en: My dear Okasan.
translation.zh: 亲爱的姆妈

translation.en: We will see...
translation.zh: 我们走着瞧

translation.en: ...won't we?
translation.zh: 对吧？

translation.en: Sayuri, your room is too small. Take Hatsumomo's.
translation.zh:
小百合 你的房间太小了
搬进初桃的房里吧

translation.en: From now on, your name is Nitta Sayuri.
translation.zh: 从现在开始 你的名字叫新田小百合

translation.en: May I congratulate you both. You too.
translation.zh:
-恭喜二位
-也恭喜你

translation.en: SAYURI: Onei-san.
translation.zh: 大姐

translation.en: Everything we wanted, you made happen. Thank you.
translation.zh:
我们的一切梦想
在你的努力下都实现了 谢谢你

translation.en: May I ask who? Dr. Crab.
translation.zh:
-我能问问竞拍到的人是谁吗？
-是螃蟹医生

translation.en: Was Nobu disappointed?
translation.zh:
-延对我很失望吗？
-延没有参与竞价

translation.en: Nobu did not bid. It was against his mighty principles.
translation.zh:
-延对我很失望吗？
-延没有参与竞价 那违背了他的原则

translation.en: Dr. Crab was opposed by the Baron. My Baron.
translation.zh:
螃蟹先生最大的竞争对手是男爵
我的男爵

translation.en: Do you want to know the truth, Sayuri?
translation.zh: 你想知道真相吗？小百合

translation.en: He was the highest bidder.
translation.zh: 他才是出价最高的人

translation.en: Forgive me. But I let it go to Dr. Crab.
translation.zh: 原谅我 但我转给了螃蟹医生

translation.en: I think you understand why.
translation.zh: 我想你明白原因

translation.en: I swear to you, I am innocent. Of course you are.
translation.zh:
-我发誓 我是清白的
-那是当然

translation.en: No man would ever bid so much for a thing he had already taken.
translation.zh:
如果他已经占有过你了
是不可能出价这么高的

translation.en: It was my own fault. I did not protect you.
translation.zh: 那是我的错 我没有保护好你

translation.en: Celebrate this moment, Sayuri.
translation.zh: 享受这一刻吧 小百合

translation.en: Tonight, the lights in the hanamachi all burn for you.
translation.zh: 今晚 花街的烛火都是为你而燃的

translation.en: MOTHER: My daughter.
translation.zh: 我的女儿

translation.en: You are full geisha now.
translation.zh: 你现在是个完整的艺妓了

translation.en: SAYURI: What are you doing in my room?
translation.zh: 你跑到我房里来干什么？

translation.en: I came to congratulate you.
translation.zh: 我是来恭喜你的

translation.en: Please get out.
translation.zh: 请出去

translation.en: Why, little Chiyo. Look what I found.
translation.zh: 小千代 瞧我发现了什么

translation.en: His initials, how elegant.
translation.zh: 他名字的首字母 真优雅

translation.en: You've been hiding your love for a long time.
translation.zh: 你把自己的真爱藏了很久

translation.en: The sacrifice every geisha must make. Don't!
translation.zh:
-这是每个艺妓都必须做出的牺牲
-不要

translation.en: Isn't this where you keep it? Next to your heart?
translation.zh:
你是藏在这里的吗？
放在你的心口处？

translation.en: Give it back!
translation.zh: 还给我

translation.en: Give it back!
translation.zh: 还给我

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Mother!
translation.zh: 姆妈

translation.en: Pumpkin! Mother!
translation.zh: 小南瓜 姆妈

translation.en: MOTHER: Kimono!
translation.zh: 姆妈

translation.en: Kimono! Pumpkin!
translation.zh: 和服 小南瓜

translation.en: SAYURI: I could be her.
translation.zh: 我原本也可能成为她

translation.en: Now I am geisha to this house.
translation.zh: 现在我成了这里的艺妓

translation.en: I could be her.
translation.zh: 我也可能成为她

translation.en: Were we so different?
translation.zh: 我们真的那么截然不同吗？

translation.en: She loved once. She hoped once.
translation.zh: 她也曾爱过 充满希望过

translation.en: I might be looking into my own future.
translation.zh: 我看到的或许是我自己的未来

translation.en: Until the real future came falling from the air.
translation.zh: 直到真正的未来降临

translation.en: CHAIRMAN: Stop.
translation.zh: 停车

translation.en: Oh, Korin. Have you seen Sayuri? No. I don't know.
translation.zh:
-香林 你看到小百合了吗？
-没有 我不知道

translation.en: MAMEHA: Chairman!
translation.zh: 会长

translation.en: They are sending us away, but they won't say where.
translation.zh: 他们要把我们送走 但却没说去哪儿

translation.en: Osaka. But you must not go. The city is a prime target.
translation.zh:
是去大阪 但你们千万不能去
那里是主要袭击目标

translation.en: Get your things, quickly.
translation.zh: 快去拿上行李

translation.en: Nobu and I are trying to find safe havens... ...for as many of you as we can. Come.
translation.zh:
延和我在努力寻找避难所
尽量保护更多的人 跟我来

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: 给

translation.en: Work certificate. Nurse's aide. Friend of mine is chief surgeon in Kameoka.
translation.zh:
这是助理护士的工作证
我一个朋友是龟冈的外科主任

translation.en: What about Sayuri? Can't we go together?
translation.zh:
那小百合怎么办？
我们不能一起走吗？

translation.en: Don't worry. She will be taken care of.
translation.zh: 别担心 我会照顾好她的

translation.en: Here you are. Here we go!
translation.zh: 好了 快走吧

translation.en: -Sayuri. -Onei-san.
translation.zh:
-小百合
-大姐

translation.en: Sayuri! Come.
translation.zh: 小百合 跟我来

translation.en: This is Arima. He will take you into the hills.
translation.zh: 这是有马 他会带你去山里躲藏

translation.en: Nobu has got a friend there. A kimono-maker.
translation.zh: 延在那边有个朋友 是制作和服的

translation.en: Anyone stops you, show them this.
translation.zh: 如果有人拦你 就给他们看这个

translation.en: -Do I have to go? -It's remote. You will be safe.
translation.zh:
-我必须得走吗？
-那里很遥远 你在那里很安全

translation.en: What about you? You said Osaka was dangerous.
translation.zh: 那你呢？你说过大阪很危险

translation.en: Our factory is there. I have no choice.
translation.zh: 我们的工厂在那边 我别无选择

translation.en: Go!
translation.zh: 快走

translation.en: I will express your gratitude to Nobu-san.
translation.zh: 我会代你向延先生表达谢意的

translation.en: SAYURI: A year without news...
translation.zh:
整整一年 除了死亡、战败
耻辱的消息

translation.en: ...except news of death, defeat, shame.
translation.zh:
整整一年 除了死亡、战败
耻辱的消息 没有任何音讯

translation.en: Rumors of cities evaporating into clouds of smoke.
translation.zh: 还有关于城市蒸发成灰的传言

translation.en: Then another year...
translation.zh: 接着又过了一年

translation.en: ...and then another...
translation.zh: 然后又是一年

translation.en: ...until the old life is a dream life.
translation.zh: 直到旧日的生活都化成了一场梦

translation.en: Was I ever geisha?
translation.zh: 我曾是个艺妓吗？

translation.en: Did I ever dance... ...holding a fan?
translation.zh: 我曾持着羽扇翩翩起舞吗？

translation.en: Who would hold a fan now...
translation.zh: 现在还有谁会手持羽扇呢？

translation.en: ...or paint their lips?
translation.zh: 或是浓妆艳抹？

translation.en: And then another year.
translation.zh: 然后又过了一年

translation.en: Nothing.
translation.zh: 什么消息都没有

translation.en: Rice. Work.
translation.zh: 吃饭 工作

translation.en: Rice. Work.
translation.zh: 吃饭 工作

translation.en: Nothing.
translation.zh: 什么都没有

translation.en: MAN: Sayuri!
translation.zh: 小百合

translation.en: Sayuri! A man from Osaka has come to see you.
translation.zh: 小百合 有个从大阪来的人想见你

translation.en: Nobu-san.
translation.zh: 延先生

translation.en: General Tottori was captured and tried as a war criminal.
translation.zh:
鸟取将军被俘获
作为战争犯接受审判

translation.en: The Baron lost his fortune and committed suicide.
translation.zh: 男爵失去了全部的财富 自杀了

translation.en: What about the okiya?
translation.zh: 那置屋呢？

translation.en: Mr. Bekku is gone, but the others-- Auntie and Mother?
translation.zh:
-别宫先生走了 其他人…
-婶娘和姆妈呢？

translation.en: NOBU: Indestructible, as always.
translation.zh: 坚不可摧 一如既往

translation.en: And the Chairman?
translation.zh: 会长呢？

translation.en: As well as can be expected.
translation.zh: 就那样 算不错了

translation.en: This is all that remains of our factories.
translation.zh: 我们所有的工厂最后只剩下这个了

translation.en: I'm so sorry, Nobu-san.
translation.zh: 我很遗憾 延先生

translation.en: Sayuri....
translation.zh: 小百合

translation.en: We want to rebuild, but to do that we will need your help.
translation.zh:
我们想重建工厂 但要实现这个目标
我们需要你的帮助

translation.en: What can I do? Somewhere, under those rags...
translation.zh:
-我能做些什么？
-在你这身破烂的衣衫下

translation.en: ...are you still the greatest geisha in Miyako?
translation.zh: 依然藏着当年京都最出色的艺妓吗？

translation.en: If a tree has no leaves or branches, can you still call it a tree?
translation.zh:
如果一棵树没有任何枝叶
那还叫是树吗？

translation.en: With nothing but rubble at my feet, can I still call myself a businessman?
translation.zh:
我现在脚下只剩破石头了
我还能自称是生意人吗？

translation.en: I should have taken better care of you. Please, you saved my life.
translation.zh:
-我应该把你照顾得更好才对
-别这么说 你救了我的命

translation.en: I owe you so much in return.
translation.zh: 我欠你的太多了

translation.en: The Chairman and I need American financing.
translation.zh: 会长和我需要美国人的资助

translation.en: There is a man, a certain Colonel Derricks...
translation.zh: 有位德里克斯上校

translation.en: ...who has the power to grant us a contract.
translation.zh: 有权力批准我们的合同

translation.en: I showed him your picture.
translation.zh: 我给他看了你的照片

translation.en: He asked to meet you.
translation.zh: 他要求见你一面

translation.en: I am not a persuasive man, Sayuri. But if you and a few geisha...
translation.zh:
我不是很擅长说服别人 小百合
但你和其他一些艺妓

translation.en: ...would once again put on your kimono and join us...
translation.zh:
将可以再次穿上你们的和服
和我们一起

translation.en: ...we could show the Americans how hospitable our country can be.
translation.zh:
我们可以让美国人领略下
我们的国家是多么热情好客

translation.en: How I wish, Nobu-san.
translation.zh: 我也希望可以 延先生

translation.en: But that was a long time ago. I have no doubt, Sayuri...
translation.zh:
-但那已经是前尘旧事了
-小百合 我依然坚信

translation.en: ...that you could still melt the heart of any man.
translation.zh: 你可以融化任何男人的心

translation.en: No matter how resistant.
translation.zh: 他们毫无抵抗之力

translation.en: I am not accustomed to begging...
translation.zh: 我不习惯求别人

translation.en: ...but please know that if you consent...
translation.zh: 但请你明白 如果你能同意

translation.en: ...the Chairman and I would be most grateful.
translation.zh: 会长和我将感激不尽

translation.en: VENDOR: One dollar. One dollar.
translation.zh: 1美元

translation.en: SAYURI: The Chairman needed me.
translation.zh: 会长需要我

translation.en: But I was a far cry from the geisha I had once been.
translation.zh: 但我早已不再是曾经的那个艺妓了

translation.en: The secrets of our hidden world were postcards now for girls back home.
translation.zh:
我们那个隐秘世界的秘密
现在成了异国女孩手中的明信片

translation.en: Any streetwalker with a painted face and silk kimono...
translation.zh:
任何涂了脂粉
穿着丝绸和服的街头妓女

translation.en: ...could call herself a geisha.
translation.zh: 也可以自称是艺妓了

translation.en: I looked for the one person who might help:
translation.zh: 我寻找那个唯一或许能帮到我的人

translation.en: Mameha.
translation.zh: 豆叶

translation.en: The war was written on her face.
translation.zh: 她的脸上满是战争的痕迹

translation.en: Everything about her, not just her home, was less than before.
translation.zh:
她的房子 以及其他的一切
都大不如前

translation.en: Sayuri, when my poor Baron filled his pockets with stones... ...I was desperate.
translation.zh:
小百合 当可怜的男爵投河自杀后
我就走投无路了

translation.en: What could I do? I sold my kimono, I traded my jade combs for rations.
translation.zh:
我能怎么办？我把和服都卖掉了
把玉梳拿去换救济粮

translation.en: It was painful at first, but I have made my peace.
translation.zh:
一开始很痛苦
但后来也就安心接受现实了

translation.en: Now, I make a small but tidy living renting rooms.
translation.zh:
现在我通过出租房子
过着安稳的小生活

translation.en: I am not about to go chasing the past.
translation.zh: 我不打算再追忆过去

translation.en: It might do you good.
translation.zh: 这可能会对你有好处

translation.en: -How? -To remind you that, once...
translation.zh:
怎么说？ 可以让你回忆起
曾经 只需轻轻一瞥

translation.en: ...with a single glance, you could bring a man like the Baron to his knees.
translation.zh:
可以让你回忆起
曾经 只需轻轻一瞥 你就能让男爵这样的男人
跪倒在你面前

translation.en: Well....
translation.zh: 这个…

translation.en: I did keep one kimono.
translation.zh: 我的确留下了一件和服

translation.en: The Baron gave it to me when he became my danna.
translation.zh: 是男爵成为我的恩客的时候送给我的

translation.en: Thank you, Onei-san.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 大姐

translation.en: So tell me. What do we know about entertaining Americans?
translation.zh:
告诉我 关于取悦美国人
我们需要先了解些什么？

translation.en: Chiyo-chan! Is that you?
translation.zh: 小千代 是你吗？

translation.en: SAYURI: I have no right to ask favors of you, Pumpkin, I know that.
translation.zh: 我无权请你帮忙 小南瓜 我知道的

translation.en: Guess what. I only smoke Chesterfields now.
translation.zh: 你猜怎么着？我现在只抽美国香烟了

translation.en: I have wanted to apologize to you for so long about the okiya.
translation.zh: 多年来我一直想为置屋的事向你道歉

translation.en: These soldiers, you know who they've got me singing?
translation.zh: 你知道那些水手让我唱谁的歌吗？

translation.en: -It should have gone to you. -Frank Sinatra and Dinah Shore.
translation.zh:
-置屋本该是属于你的 而不是我
-弗兰克辛纳屈和狄娜肖尔
